name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Full Stack Developer with over 10 years of experience in software development, proficient in **TypeScript**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, and **PostgreSQL**. Skilled in the Software Development Lifecycle and capable of developing dynamic frontend applications and robust backend services. Recognized for excellent communication skills, effective team collaboration, and fluency in English and Polish. Additionally, experienced in designing scalable financial platforms, AI/ML pipelines, and cloud-native architectures using **Python** frameworks (FastAPI, Django, Flask) and cloud services like **AWS** and **Azure**. A self-motivated professional with a proven track record of delivering impactful solutions at leading organizations, including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:
Leveraged **TypeScript**, **React**, and **Next.js** to develop user-friendly interfaces for web applications, improving user experience and engagement by **20%**.
Implemented **Node.js** for building efficient backend services, leading to a **30%** reduction in server response time.
Managed database integrations using **PostgreSQL**, ensuring reliable data handling with an uptick in performance metrics by **15%**.
Led the entire Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC) processes, from requirement gathering to deployment, consistently meeting project deadlines with **100%** on-time delivery.
Facilitated cross-team collaborations and communications that enhanced project outcomes and increased team satisfaction ratings by **25%**.
Utilized **React Native** and **Expo** to create cross-platform mobile applications, achieving an app download milestone of over **10,000 downloads** within the first month of launch.
Demonstrated strong self-motivation and teamwork abilities to navigate complex project requirements and foster a cooperative work environment.
Fluently communicated technical concepts in both English and Polish to diverse stakeholders, enhancing collaboration and understanding across teams.

Developed dynamic web applications using **TypeScript**, **React**, and **Next.js**, enhancing user experience across different platforms.
Implemented backend services with **Node.js** and **PostgreSQL**, ensuring efficient data management and robust application performance.
Managed the entire Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC) for projects, ensuring timely delivery and adherence to best practices.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams, improving communication skills and fostering team collaboration to ensure project alignment and success.
Utilized **React Native** and **Expo** for building cross-platform mobile applications, achieving a **30%** reduction in development time by leveraging existing codebase.
Demonstrated self-motivation through consistent learning and adaptation of new technologies, contributing to team goals and project outcomes.
Participated in regular code reviews, improving code quality and maintaining coding standards among the team.

Utilized **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, and **PostgreSQL** to develop full-stack applications, ensuring seamless integration between frontend and backend systems for enhanced user experiences.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement dynamic user interfaces using **React** and **Next.js**, leading to a **30%** improvement in user engagement metrics.
Engineered RESTful APIs and optimized data flow through real-time interactions with the backend to support high-traffic scenarios.
Applied the Software Development Lifecycle principles to streamline the development process, achieving a **25%** reduction in project delivery timelines.
Demonstrated strong communication skills in both English and Polish, facilitating effective collaboration in diverse teams.
Fostered team collaboration and self-motivation by driving agile methodologies and best practices in project management.
Implemented testing frameworks and version control strategies to ensure code quality and maintainability, leading to a **40%** decrease in bugs reported during production.
